languages.text: [draft]Targets in a circle with a 4-cell radius around the Psyker and the Psyker themselves suffer 2×X damage and must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −2×X penalty. Creatures that fail the test become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the Psyker's next turn. The Psyker automatically fails the test. At the beginning of the Psyker's next turn the effect repeats for the Psyker. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. In all the formulas, X equals the level of this psychic power granted by a psyker's stave.

traits.locale_text: [draft]Targets in a circle with a 4-cell radius around the Psyker and the Psyker themselves suffer 2×X damage and must pass a Willpower test with a −2×X penalty. Creatures that fail the test become immobilised until the Psyker's next turn. The Psyker automatically fails the test. At the beginning of the Psyker's next turn the effect repeats for the Psyker. This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp. In all the formulas, X equals the level of this psychic power granted by a psyker's stave.
